column2: It is a great question, said Candide.
column3: It is a great question, said Candide.

column2: Candide did not quite agree to that, but he affirmed nothing.
column3: Candide did not quite agree to that, but he affirmed nothing.

column2: Paquette continued her trade wherever she went, but made nothing of it.
column3: Paquette continued her trade wherever she went, but made nothing of it.

column2: Ha! said Pangloss to Paquette, "Providence has then brought you amongst us again, my poor child!
column3: Ha! said Pangloss to Paquette, "Providence has then brought you amongst us again, my poor child!

column2: Hold your tongue, answered the Dervish.
column3: Hold your tongue, answered the Dervish.

column2: Their little plot of land produced plentiful crops.
column3: Their little plot of land produced plentiful crops.

column2: All that is very well, answered Candide, "but let us cultivate our garden."
column3: All that is very well, answered Candide, "but let us cultivate our garden."
